snippet: Chris Mullin’s first win as a coach was in the books, with a 66-57 victory over Wagner at Carnesecca Arena on Friday.
abstract: St John's defeats Wagner, 66-57, in men's college basketball, giving Chris Mullin his first win as a coach.
lead_paragraph: Chris Mullin’s first win as a coach was in the books, with a 66-57 victory over Wagner at Carnesecca Arena on Friday.

headline.print_headline: St. John’s Gives Nervous Mullin First Coaching Victory in His First Try
headline.main: St. John’s Gives Nervous Chris Mullin First Coaching Victory in His First Try
